scopecontent.p: This is a collection of photograph albums documenting trips taken by the Morris family. Albums include: photograph album/scrapbook and scrapbook recording a 1925 trip to England on board R.M.S. Mauretania of the Cunard line; album recording a 1934 trip to France, with an illustration of SS Bremen on the cover; and an album of a 1938 trip aboard the SS Vandyck from Miami, Fl, to Haiti, Jamaica, and Havana. The collection also includes a journal kept by Janet Morris on 1925 trip.
